description: Reliable Distributed Provisioning Grid (RDPG) is an Open Source operations framework built to provide a platform for deploying and provisioning PostgreSQL service clusters. These service clusters provide shared and dedicated managed databases to applications. The RDPG system is written on top of the BOSH operations-lifecycle management platform (BOSH is used to deploy and manage the lifecycle of Cloud Foundry).
